title: Kotlin for Java Developers
subtitle: The best way to learn idiomatic Kotlin for Java Developers
metaDescription: During this intensive, practical, hands-on workshop you will learn fundamentals of Kotlin – the fast growing and the most loved JVM language.
description: During this intensive, practical, hands-on workshop you will learn fundamentals of Kotlin – the fast growing and the most loved JVM language.
audience: This course is for Java developers that want to learn how to write clean and idiomatic Kotlin code.
certification: Yes, you'll earn a certificate of accomplishment.
language: The course is taught in English.
